dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 15, 2005 12:39 AM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing
Activity]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Fri Apr 15 00:06:46 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim 4.50)        id
1DMIZj-0001w9-MP        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 14 Apr 2005
23:37:03 -0500

helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1DMIZd-0008rP-PW
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 14 Apr 2005 23:37:03 -0500

ESMTP id a29sm512265rng.2005.04.14.21.36.47;        Thu, 14 Apr 2005 21:36:47
- -0700 (PDT)
Message-ID: <425F44DE.2020501@gmail.com>
Date: Thu, 14 Apr 2005 23:36:46 -0500
From: Berck E. Nash <flyboy@gmail.com>
User-Agent: Debian Thunderbird 1.0.2 (X11/20050331)
X-Accept-Language: en-us, en
MIME-Version: 1.0
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com
designates        64.233.170.201 as permitted sender)
client-ip=64.233.170.201;        envelope-from=flyboy@gmail.com;
helo=rproxy.gmail.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -98.2
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing
Activity
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -98.2

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity

14 March 2005

Dear Sir or Madam,

I have reason to believe that the domain listed below, which appears to be
on servers under your control, contains copyrighted content which was
originally posted on my own site.

The domain:
www.malpractice-central.com

The infringing material:
http://www.malpractice-central.com/malpractice__at_sunrise_hospital_in_las_v
egas_nv.html

My copyrighted material:
http://blog.nachzen.net/

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that the information in this
notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of myself,
Berck Nash, the owner of the copyrights in the works identified above. I
have a good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed
above have been authorized by myself, my agent, or the law.

I hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take
expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described
above, and thereby prevent the unauthorized distribution of this material
via your company's network.

I appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise me regarding
what actions you take.

Sincerely,

Berck E. Nash
353 48th AVE NW APT 7
Norman, OK 73072
flyboy@gmail.com
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCX1ONvK/XpJs6oyURAiTaAJ9ESq08Xx6ybQ+rBwW40aVkKCaFIQCgikWD
RwXf/pCUUPOL2SVSt89W3vM=
=HlZ0
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
